text: A Suurkilpailu (Grand Race) is a harness racing event in Finland in which the purse for the winner is at or over 10,000 Euros (approximately 13,500 USD). All Grand Races are authorised by the Finnish trotting and breeding association, ', the central horse organisation of Finland. The most important Grand Races are Finlandia-Ajo, St Michel and Kymi Grand Prix. ==Events for light trotters== {| class="wikitable" style="margin: 0.5em 0 0 0;" width=95% |- !colspan=3|Event !colspan=2|Admission !colspan=3|Qualification !colspan=2|Race !colspan=1|Prizes |} {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin: 0.5em 0 0 0;" width=95% |- !
